name: Steel, Spice, and Everything Nice
description:
You are a chef making ends meet by running a diner in a small town. Today’s special is Fried Rice so hunker down and fire up those stoves because you’ve got a lot of hungry mouths to feed.

A small game, inspired by a mix of Overcooked 2 and Cooking Mama, that is designed to teach players a little more in depth about some Eastern Asian cuisines, starting with the most basic: Fried Rice.

Ingredients must be properly prepared to maximize the quality of your dish so the following matters:

1. How many times some ingredients are chopped.
2. The order the ingredients are added into the wok.
3. How long the stove is heating the ingredients.
4. How many times the ingredients are tossed in the wok.
5. If all the necessary ingredients are served.

Moving - ARROW KEYS
Grabbing / Placing Objects - Z
Action (Chopping / Adding / Tossing / Serving) - X
Activate Forbidden Technique - SHIFT
Pause- ESCAPE

This can be played in browser, but downloading the executable is recommended for additional performance.
